sourceMeaningMnemonic: From my <radical>mouth</radical> I have told you <radical>seven</radical> times not to do that. Now I have to <kanji>scold</kanji> you.
meaningInfo: SEVEN TIMES! You'd think you'd learn.
readingMnemonic: What were you doing wrong that caused me to <kanji>scold</kanji> you? You were feeding the <ja><reading>鹿</reading></ja> (<ja>しか</ja>). If you feed them they'll never be able to feed themselves!
readingInfo: Imagine yourself feeding the deer, then getting scolded (or you doing the scolding to someone else feeding the deer, whichever works best).
